content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in pistoia on april 29 2010 the case involves a dispute over the division of a property in pistoia between the plaintiff and the defendants the plaintiff claims to own 50 of the property while the defendants own 25 the court determines that the property can be divided and assigns the defendants share to the plaintiff the court also considers the expenses incurred by both parties and determines a balance due to the plaintiff additionally the court orders one party referred to as ol to pay the other party referred to as lg an adjustment amount of 6501340 euros plus legal interest both parties are responsible for paying the costs of the proceedings with the costs of the court being split equally between them the courts decision was made on november 2 2009
